hypothesis_content.title: ETH/BTC Ratio Daily Bollinger Band Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When the ETH/BTC daily closing price crosses outside 1.5 standard deviations (Bollinger Band width) from its 20-day moving average, it will revert to the 20DMA within 5 trading days with 70% probability, provided total crypto market cap is not in a STRESS regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETH/BTC ratio exhibits strong mean-reverting properties as capital rotates between the two dominant assets. Extreme deviations often correct as traders rebalance portfolios. The 1.5σ threshold balances signal frequency with reliability.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC daily close > 20DMA + (1.5 * 20-day std) OR < 20DMA - (1.5 * 20-day std)
Total crypto market cap 30-day volatility < 90th percentile (non-STRESS)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves another 1.5 std beyond entry point (breakout continuation)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate < 65% OR average time to target > 5 days in non-stress regimes when backtested from 2018-2025.
